word_mean: 纤维蛋白溶解〔作用〕：酶作用引起的纤维蛋白溶解

sentence.Network_en: Function of platelet; Anticoagulation system; fibrinolysis; The principles of blood transfusion.
sentence.Network_cn: 血小板的功能; 抗凝系统; 纤维蛋白溶解; 输血的原则.

sentence.Network_en: Usually we have an endogenous system - it's called fibrinolysis - to dissolve the thrombi.
sentence.Network_cn: 通常我们有一个内成系统 —— 被称做纤维蛋白溶解 —— 用以溶解血凝块.

sentence.Network_en: Drugs causing fibrinolysis have been utilized therapeutically.
sentence.Network_cn: 纤维蛋白溶解药物已被用于临床治疗.

list.exp: 原发性纤维蛋白溶解症
list.abs: ...声明医学内容仅供参考，不能视作专业意见。网上任何关于疾病的建议都不能替代执业医师的当面诊断。原发性纤维蛋白溶解症(primary fibrinolysis)又称原发性纤溶是由于纤溶系统活性异常增强导致纤维蛋白过早过度破坏和(或)纤维蛋白原等凝血因子大量降解.
纤维蛋白溶解综合征 fibrinolysis syndrome 弥散性血管内凝血 disseminated inravascular coagulation,DIC 异常纤维蛋白原血症 dysfibrinogenemia.
drugs causing fibrinolysis have been utilized therapeutically .纤维蛋白溶解药物已经被用于临床治疗。

means.word_mean: 1. a normal ongoing process that dissolves fibrin and results in the removal of small blood clots;
